mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_p_preferential_activity (id, code, name, name_first_letter, type, type_name, subtable_name, color, starttime, endtime, apply_all, createtime, creator, activity_introduction, use_notice) VALUES(#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{name_first_letter}, #{type}, #{type_name}, #{subtable_name}, #{color}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{apply_all}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{activity_introduction}, #{use_notice})

INSERT INTO t_p_preferential_detail (id, preferential, unitflag, free_reason, discount, starttime, endtime, createtime,
can_credit, amount) VALUES(#{id}, #{preferential}, #{unitflag}, #{free_reason}, #{discount}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{createtime},
#{can_credit}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select id, code,name,name_first_letter,type,type_name,subtable_name,color,starttime,endtime,apply_all,createtime,creator from t_p_preferential_activity where id = #{id}
select itemid as code,itemDesc as name from t_dictionary where type='cooperationNnit'
select code,name from t_p_preferential_type_dict where code not in(01,02,03,04,05,06,0601,0602,99)
select itemid as code,itemDesc as name from t_dictionary where type='ACTIVITY'
select itemid as code,itemDesc as name from t_dictionary where type='PAYWAYTYPE'

select tpa.name as name,tpa.type as type,tpa.type_name as type_name, tpa.color as color,tpa.apply_all as apply_all,tpa.activity_introduction as activity_introduction, tpa.use_notice as use_notice, tpd.discount as discount,tpd.free_reason as free_reason, tpd.company_name as company_name,tpd.can_credit as can_credit, tpd.starttime as starttime,tpd.endtime as endtime,tpd.amount as amount from t_p_preferential_activity tpa,t_p_preferential_detail tpd where tpa.id = tpd.preferential and tpa.id=#{id}
select branch,branch_name from t_p_preferential_branch where preferential=#{id}
